content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
{'role': 'system', 'content': 'This reminds you of these events from your past: \nAs the user, I received confirmation that the code was successfully written to a file named "best_ways_to_learn.py" using a command to write to a file. I then sent a command to execute the updated Python file with the filename "/home/atlas/autogpt/auto_gpt_workspace/best_ways_to_learn.py". The command returned a list of the best ways to learn various languages and I browsed a website for more information on the best ways to learn a language abroad.'}
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[{'role': 'your computer', 'content': "Command browse_website returned: Answer gathered from website: The text mentions language schools as a program for traveling abroad, but it does not specifically mention the best ways to learn a language abroad. The text provides information on various other programs for traveling abroad, including study abroad, volunteer abroad, teach abroad, internships abroad, gap year abroad, high school abroad, online programs, online teaching, online jobs, virtual internships, virtual study abroad, and virtual volunteer abroad. \n \n Links: ['Skip to main content (https://www.gooverseas.com/blog/best-places-to-learn-a-language-abroad#main-content)', '\\n\\n (https://www.gooverseas.com/)', ' Menu  (https://www.gooverseas.com/blog/best-places-to-learn-a-language-abroad#nav)', 'Study Abroad (https://www.gooverseas.com/study-abroad)', 'Volunteer Abroad (https://www.gooverseas.com/volunteer-abroad)']"}]
"""
